title: The Trump administration leaned on african countries. The goal: get business for Elon Musk
summary: The State Department pressured Gambia to adopt Starlink’s internet service by threatening to cut off developmental aid to the low-income African nation. US diplomats used similar tactics on behalf of Musk’s Starlink in Cameroon, Lesotho, and Bangladesh
description: The State Department pressured Gambia to adopt Starlink’s internet service by threatening to cut off developmental aid to the low-income African nation. US diplomats used similar tactics on behalf of Musk’s Starlink in Cameroon, Lesotho, and Bangladesh
